title: Unlearning Copaganda, Tulsa on Juneteenth? Really? 6.12.20
itunes:title: Unlearning Copaganda, Tulsa on Juneteenth? Really? 6.12.20
description:
In episode 650, Jack and Miles are joined by The Male Gaze and The Dark Weeb co-host and comedian Brodie Reed to discuss another cringeworthy PSA from celebrities, Lady Antebellum changing their name to Lady A, Trump having a rally in Tulsa on Juneteenth, 365 DNI, what a study of what 10,000 white-collars about race revealed, Cops and Live PD being cancelled, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Hollywood Celebs ‘Take Responsibility’ for Racism in Incredibly Cringeworthy PSA
  2. Lady Antebellum Changes Band Name and Apologizes for Making Fans Feel "Unsafe, Unseen or Unvalued"
  3. 'Slap in the face to black people': Trump faces backlash over rally on Juneteenth
  4. Trump administration won’t say who got $511 billion in taxpayer-backed coronavirus loans
  5. Netflix’s steamy movie ‘365 DNI’ slammed for glamorizing Stockholm syndrome
  6. At a #ThinkIn last week, @JohnAmaechi explained how a survey of 10,000 white-collar workers revealed that the behaviour of ‘reasonable, well-intentioned people’ carries undertones of bias.
  7. ‘Cops,’ Long-Running Reality Show That Glorified Police, Is Canceled
  8. The untold truth of COPS
  9. Cops on TV: The reality show 'COPS' is 'the best recruiting tool for policing ever'
  10. Running from Cops: How a decades-old reality TV show distorted America's view of policing
  11. 'Cops' crew member killed in police shooting
  12. ‘Live P.D.’ Canceled By A&E Amid Ongoing Protests Against Police Brutality
  13. WATCH: damanwitdahorn - for the rest of my life

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
